extension.searchTitle: To redesignate the Martin Luther King, Junior, National Historic Site in the State of Georgia, and for other purposes.; Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park Act of 2016;H.R. 2880 (RH)

titleInfo.title: To redesignate the Martin Luther King, Junior, National Historic Site in the State of Georgia, and for other purposes.
Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park Act of 2016

extension.shortTitle: Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park Act of 2016
extension.action: Mr. Lewis (for himself, Ms. Moore, Mr. Hastings, Ms. Clarke of New York, Ms. Hahn, Mr. Higgins, Mr. Grijalva, Ms. Lee, Mr. Van Hollen, Mr. Nadler, Mr. Levin, Mr. Israel, Mr. Meeks, Mr. Bishop of Georgia, Mr. Cummings, Mr. Johnson of Georgia, Ms. Brown of Florida, Mr. Cohen, Ms. Wilson of Florida, Mr. Rangel, Ms. Fudge, Ms. Jackson Lee, and Mr. Serrano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

Additional sponsors: Mr. Carter of Georgia, Mr. Scott of Virginia, Mr. David Scott of Georgia, Mr. Honda, Mrs. Watson Coleman, Mr. DeSaulnier, Mr. Murphy of Florida, Mr. Connolly, Mr. Swalwell of California, Mr. Huffman, Ms. Eddie Bernice Johnson of Texas, Mr. McGovern, Ms. McCollum, Mr. Polis, Mr. Ryan of Ohio, Mr. Clay, Mr. Fattah, Mrs. Lawrence, Ms. Sewell of Alabama, Ms. Norton, Mr. Payne, Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois, Mr. Richmond, Ms. Plaskett, Ms. Bass, Mr. Jeffries, Mr. Butterfield, Mr. Carson of Indiana, Miss Rice of New York, Mr. Al Green of Texas, Mr. Gallego, Mr. Thompson of Mississippi, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. Doggett, Ms. Adams, Ms. Maxine Waters of California, Mr. Cleaver, Ms. Velazquez, Mr. Clyburn, Mr. Loudermilk, Mr. Veasey, Ms. Schakowsky, Mr. Yarmuth, Mr. Brady of Pennsylvania, Mr. Rush, Mr. Ellison, Mr. Blumenauer, Mr. Smith of Washington, Ms. Titus, Mr. Beyer, Mr. Allen, Mr. Austin Scott of Georgia, Mr. Schiff, Mr. Aguilar, and Mrs. Beatty
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
